overview: The Pillows celebrates its 15th anniversary on September 16, 2004. Members and related parties will talk about the period from the time of formation to the present, including valuable live images and images at the time of program appearance.  In addition, as a bonus video, the history of short films, T-shirts and Buster-kun that was screened at the venue during the tour is recorded.  A documentary film that shows everything about The Pillows.
title: Walkin' on the Spiral
